channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ PLEASE LET BRANDON ELLIS BE IN NEVERMORE ☠⚡
item.description:
### CRANK UP THE CHAOS: WE NEED BRANDON ELLIS IN NEVERMORE! 🤘🔥
**OMG, metalheads and crypto warriors!** Let’s shatter the silence like a skull crashing through a concrete wall! We got a fire burning in our veins that’s screaming for one name—BRANDON ELLIS! This dude’s got the riffs that could wake the dead and a style so slick it’d make a wolf howl under the full moon! 🐺💀
Check out this shot of him and guitar god *Jeff Loomis—* a duo that looks like they’re ready to take the stage and unleash *hell on Earth!* If there’s ANYONE who deserves to slide into the dark alleys of NEVERMORE, it’s him! Imagine the sheer power, the epic solos, the metal madness! It’s like mixing Bitcoin with a 10,000-watt amplifier—pure electric chaos! ⚡💰
So what’s the hold-up? Metal legends don’t just appear from the void; they need to be summoned! Let’s raise our voices louder than a million death metal growls! **PLEASE?** Let’s make it happen, fam! Let’s bring the RITUAL of ROCK back. Grab your axes, your crypto wallets, and your sinister spirits, and let’s make some noise for BRANDON! \m/
The metal gods are watching, and they want to see this happen. Smash that link and let the world know—*BRANDON ELLIS belongs in NEVERMORE!* \m/🔥🤘
Read more and rage with fury—in metal unity, we will conquer!
\---Metal Injection \--- Rock on! 🖤
#Headbangers #DeathMetal #HeavyMetal #MetalScene #ThrashMetal
